lead_paragraph: Assailants with knives killed the man in northern Bangladesh, the latest in a series of attacks of religious minorities there.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Bangladesh: Attackers Stab Christian Convert to Death
headline.main: Bangladesh: Attackers Stab Christian Convert to Death

snippet: Assailants with knives killed the man in northern Bangladesh, the latest in a series of attacks of religious minorities there.
abstract: Christian convert Hossain Ali is stabbed to death by assailants on motorbike in Kurigram, Bangladesh, latest in spate of attacks on religious minorities in country's northern region.
